lines: Lord, I hear of show`rs of blessing,
thou art scattering full and free;
Let some drop now fall on me;
Even me, even me, let some drops fall on me.
Pass me not, O gracious Father!
Sinful though my heart may be;
but the rather let thy mercy rest on me.
Have I long in sin been sleeping?
Has the world my heart been keeping?
Pass me not, O Holy Spirit!
Thou canst make the blind to see;
speak the word of peace to me.
